translated: “They cultivate the emptiness of external things by way of not apprehending anything, in order to cultivate the cultivation that is not mixed with the attention of the knowledge of path aspects.🔽“They cultivate the emptiness of external and internal things by way of not apprehending anything, in order to cultivate the cultivation that is not mixed with the attention of the knowledge of path aspects.

translated: “They cultivate the emptiness of emptiness by way of not apprehending anything, in order to cultivate the cultivation that is not mixed with the attention of the knowledge of path aspects.

translated: “They cultivate the emptiness of great extent by way of not apprehending anything, in order to cultivate the cultivation that is not mixed with the attention of the knowledge of path aspects.

translated: “For the sake of cultivating the cultivation of the non-mixed mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, they cultivate the emptiness of ultimate reality, without taking anything as a basis.🔽“For the sake of cultivating the cultivation of the non-mixed mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, they cultivate the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, without taking anything as a basis.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo //

translated: “For the sake of cultivating the cultivation of the non-mixed mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, they cultivate the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, without taking anything as a basis.

translated: “For the sake of cultivating the cultivation of the non-mixed mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, they cultivate the emptiness of the unlimited, by way of non-apprehension.🔽“For the sake of cultivating the cultivation of the non-mixed mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, they cultivate the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, by way of non-apprehension.

translated: “With attention connected with the knowledge of all modes he cultivates the great compassion, by way of nonapprehending.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom mo //

translated: “With attention connected with the knowledge of all modes he cultivates the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha, by way of nonapprehending.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: “Thus, venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva is said to be well situated in the Great Vehicle.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The venerable Śāradvatī­putra then said to the Blessed One,🔽“Blessed One, how should a bodhisattva great being

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /🔽'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste /
translated: understand the meaning of the words ‘bodhisattva’ and ‘great being’?”🔽The Blessed One replied, “Śāradvatī­putra, a bodhisattva great being should understand that the term ‘bodhisattva’ is merely a conventional expression,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so //
translated: because a bodhisattva is not apprehended.🔽Śāradvatī­putra, form is merely a name,

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //🔽chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do // chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do // don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is just a name.🔽The emptiness of the beginningless and endless is just a name.🔽The emptiness of what is not to be discarded is just a name.🔽The emptiness of nature is just a name.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is just a name.🔽The emptiness of defining characteristics is just a name.🔽The emptiness of nonobservation is just a name.🔽The emptiness of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is just a name.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: The emptiness of an intrinsic nature is just a name.🔽The emptiness of other things is just a name.🔽The emptiness of nonthings is just a name.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is just a name.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is just a name.🔽The emptiness of non-rejection is just a name.🔽The emptiness of nature is just a name.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is just a name.

original: 'dus byas stong pa @164b nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa @164b nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is just a name.🔽The emptiness of nonobservation is just a name.🔽The emptiness of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is just a name.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: The emptiness of an intrinsic nature is just a name.🔽The emptiness of other things is just a name.🔽The emptiness of nonthings is just a name.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is just a name.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is just a name.🔽The emptiness of non-rejection is just a name.🔽The emptiness of nature is just a name.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is just a name.🔽The emptiness of defining characteristics is just a name.🔽The emptiness of nonobservation is just a name.🔽The emptiness of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is just a name.🔽The emptiness of an intrinsic nature is just a name.🔽The emptiness of other things is just a name.🔽The emptiness of nonthings is just a name.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is just a name.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is just a name.🔽The emptiness of non-rejection is just a name.🔽The emptiness of nature is just a name.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is just a name.🔽The emptiness of defining

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of a beginning and end is non-apprehensible,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
translated: therefore this ‘emptiness that is the nonexistence of discarding’ is merely a name.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
translated: The thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment are merely names.🔽The thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment are merely

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: mngon par shes pa zhes bya pa 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa zhes bya pa 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //

original: 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: chos nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //

analyzed: chos kyi gnas nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: chos skyon med pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
translated: this ‘faultlessness of dharmas’ is just a name.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the very limit of reality is not apprehended,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
translated: this ‘very limit of reality’ is just a name.

original: byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
analyzed: byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do //
translated: “Awakening” is just a word.

original: sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do /
translated: “buddha” is just a word.

original: zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te /
analyzed: zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te /
translated: They know that

original: tshe dang ldan @166b pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan @166b pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o ////

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po drug cu pa //
analyzed: bam po drug cu pa //
translated: fascicle sixty

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /
translated: further, from the first production of the thought of awakening until they sit at the site of awakening, bodhisattva great beings complete all the superknowledges

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: and bring beings to maturity.

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis /

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir /
translated: he honors, venerates, and worships the blessed buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o //🔽sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste /

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to //

original: de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te /
analyzed: de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te /

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
translated: he goes from buddhafield to buddhafield

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed /

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang /

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /

original: sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /
analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo //

original: de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing /🔽lus ji lta bus sems can @167a *//
analyzed: de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can @167a *//
translated: Dwelling in the stage of nonduality,🔽he takes on a body in whatever way is necessary to benefit sentient beings.

original: rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsam shing yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsam shing yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He takes on a body in whatever way is necessary to benefit sentient beings.

original: de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du /
analyzed: de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du /

original: theg pa de dang nam du'ang mi 'bral te /
analyzed: theg pa de dang nam du'ang mi 'bral te /

original: des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang /🔽nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang /
analyzed: des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang /🔽nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang /
translated: Having attained the knowledge of a knower of all aspects,🔽he is never separated from the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.🔽He is never separated from the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.

original: mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro //
analyzed: mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro //
translated: He turns the wheel of the Dharma that cannot be turned back by any of the worlds of gods, humans, or asuras.

original: de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas /

original: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po /

analyzed: bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su sgrog pa mdzad do //

original: lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma @167b snyed dag na /
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma @167b snyed dag na /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa /

analyzed: theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste /

analyzed: nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /

translated: the Blessed Buddhas proclaim the qualities of the Bodhisattva,🔽saying:

original: 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu /
translated: “In such and such a universe,

analyzed: theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang /

analyzed: med pa'i theg pa /
translated: the bodhisattva great being named so and so, who is established in the supreme vehicle, the unsurpassed vehicle,🔽the vehicle of a tathāgata,

original: theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste /
analyzed: theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste /
translated: has attained the knowledge of all modes.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: and having attained omniscience, they turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: In the world systems in the zenith, in as many world systems as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /
translated: the lord buddhas also proclaim their qualities, saying:

original: 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa /
translated: ‘In such and such a world system,🔽the bodhisattva mahāsattva named so-and-so,🔽who is established in the unsurpassed vehicle of the Great Vehicle,

original: theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /
analyzed: theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /
translated: the supreme vehicle,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste /
translated: has attained omniscience,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: and having attained omniscience, he turns the wheel of the Dharma.’

original: de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: In that way, Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva is said to be ‘firmly established in the Great Vehicle.’

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord!

original: go cha chen po bgos so //
analyzed: go cha chen po bgos so //
translated: He is armed with the great armor.

original: go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi na /
analyzed: go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi na /
translated: When it is said that he is armed with the great armor,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord!

original: ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi pa lags /
analyzed: ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi pa lags /
translated: To what extent is the bodhisattva mahāsattva said to be armed with the great armor?”

original: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab @169b 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //🔽rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab @169b 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste /
translated: Venerable Subhūti having made this request, the Lord said to him:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: “Subhūti, here the bodhisattva mahāsattva, having donned the armor of the Great Vehicle, dons the armor of the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: dons the armor of the perfection of morality,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos /🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos / nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the perfection of wisdom.🔽He dons the armor of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of outer and inner emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of great emptiness.

original: don dam ba stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: don dam ba stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽He dons the armor of the emptiness of the compounded.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the emptiness of the uncompounded.🔽He dons the armor of the emptiness of what transcends limits.🔽He dons the armor of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽He dons the armor of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽He dons the armor of the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the emptiness of nonthings.🔽He dons the armor of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos /🔽@170a *// dbang po'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos / @170a *// dbang po'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the legs of miraculous power.🔽He dons the armor of the faculties.

original: stobs kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: stobs kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the branches of awakening.

original: lam gyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: lam gyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the truths of the noble ones.

original: bsam gtan gyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: tshad med pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the successive absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the higher knowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of fearlessness.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos /
translated: He dons the armor of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas /
translated: Having donned the armor of the buddha body,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste /
translated: This billion-world-galactic universe is filled with light.

original: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //🔽lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so // lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
translated: The world systems in the eastern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, are filled with light.🔽The world systems in the southern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, are filled with light.

original: nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //🔽byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten @170b gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so // byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten @170b gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
translated: The world systems in the western direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, are filled with light.🔽The world systems in the northern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, are filled with light.

original: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
analyzed: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
translated: The world systems in the northeastern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, are filled with light.

original: shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //🔽lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
analyzed: shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so // lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
translated: it fills with light as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River in the southeast.🔽it fills with light as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River in the southwest.

original: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //🔽'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
analyzed: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so // 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
translated: it fills with light as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River in the northwest.🔽it fills with light as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River below.

original: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
analyzed: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so //
translated: it fills with light as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River above.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
translated: This great trichiliocosm shakes, trembles, and quakes in six ways.

original: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //🔽lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //🔽nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //🔽byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //🔽byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do // lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do // nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do // byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do // byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
translated: He shook the worlds in the east, west, north,

original: shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig @171a *//
analyzed: shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig @171a *//
translated: south, the intermediate directions, and above and below, each to the number of a hundred thousand million billion worlds.🔽He shook them, stirred them, and made them quake.🔽He caused them to tremble, to tremble strongly, and to tremble intensely.🔽He caused them to quiver, to quiver strongly, and to quiver intensely.🔽He caused them to shake, to shake strongly, and to shake intensely.🔽He caused them to rock, to rock strongly, and to rock intensely.

original: rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
analyzed: rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
translated: He caused them to sway, to sway strongly, and to sway intensely.🔽He caused them to toss, to toss strongly, and to toss intensely.🔽He caused them to surge, to surge strongly, and to surge intensely.

original: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //🔽nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
analyzed: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do // nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
translated: and the worlds in the southwest, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā river, shook in six ways.🔽and the worlds in the northwest, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā river, shook in six ways.

original: 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
analyzed: 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
translated: and the worlds below, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā river, shook in six ways.

original: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
analyzed: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do //
translated: and the worlds above, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā river, shook in six ways.

original: des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te /
analyzed: des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te /
translated: He extinguished all the fires of the hells in this great trichiliocosm.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do //
translated: They all cried out, “Homage to the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One!”

original: dbyangs sgrog go /
analyzed: dbyangs sgrog go /
translated: They all proclaimed this in a loud voice.

original: de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste /
translated: At that time, the beings in the hells, having heard that sound of the Buddha, attained joy and bliss.

original: de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo //
analyzed: de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo //
translated: Through that joy and bliss, they emerged from the hells.

original: de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas /🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na /
analyzed: de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na /
translated: Having emerged from the hells,🔽they were reborn in those buddha-fields

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o //
translated: where the Blessed Buddhas were dwelling, living, and teaching.

original: des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na /
analyzed: des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na /
translated: By that, in this great trichiliocosm,

original: byol song gi skye @171b gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do //

translated: they will be reborn in those buddhafields where the lord buddhas are present, living, and teaching.🔽“In the southwestern direction, he sees as many world systems as there are particles in the four continents, and in each and every one of them he sees the Tathāgata Śākyamuni, with his form, color, marks, and signs, teaching the Dharma.🔽He sees the animal realm and the world of Yama in the southwestern direction, and in each and every one of them he sees the Tathāgata Śākyamuni, with his form, color, marks, and signs, teaching the Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs @177a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs @177a *//
translated: “In the same way, he sees the animal realm and the world of Yama in the world systems in the nāga realms, the yakṣa realms, the gandharva realms, the asura realms, the garuḍa realms, the kinnara realms, and the mahoraga realms in the southwestern direction, and in each and every one of them he sees the Tathāgata Śākyamuni, with his form, color, marks, and signs, teaching the Dharma.🔽“In the same way, he sees the animal realm and the world of Yama in the world systems in the directions, the intermediate directions, the zenith, and the nadir, and in each and every one of them he sees the Tathāgata Śākyamuni, with his form, color, marks, and signs, teaching the Dharma.

analyzed: mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du byin yang /

translated: Subhūti, it is because, when you take the dharmatā of an illusory phenomenon as the basis, the dharmatā of phenomena is just like that.

original: rab 'byor / de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Subhuti, a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who is like this is said to be wearing the great armor.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, abiding in the perfection of morality,

original: ched du bsams te skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas /

original: sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do //
translated: they establish beings in the ten wholesome courses of action.

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
translated: [They establish them in] the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the five superknowledges, the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of supernatural power,

original: dbang po lnga dang / @181a *//
analyzed: dbang po lnga dang / @181a *//
translated: the five faculties,

original: stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
analyzed: stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
translated: the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the eight deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the four noble truths, all the meditative stabilities, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of correct understanding,

original: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de /
translated: and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
translated: Has he established any in the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the five kinds of clairvoyance, the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four foundations of miraculous abilities,

original: dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
analyzed: dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
translated: the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation, the eight deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags @182a *//
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags @182a *//

original: pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang /
analyzed: pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang /
translated: great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod pa yod dam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod pa yod dam /
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?

original: gsol pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Bhagavān,

original: de ni ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ni ma mchis so //
translated: there are not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said,

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the five kinds of superknowledge, the four establishments in mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
analyzed: dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
translated: the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the eight deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa @182b bzhi dang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa @182b bzhi dang /
translated: the nine serial absorptions, the four noble truths, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of a tathāgata, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod kyang /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod kyang /

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /

translated: “Su­bhūti, it is just as when a magician or a magician’s skilled apprentice, standing at a crossroads, conjures up a crowd of people in the presence of a crowd of people

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na /
translated: and establishes them in the perfection of meditative stabilization,

original: rab 'byor / de la ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think, Su­bhūti?

original: sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am /

analyzed: sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam /
translated: Did that magician’s apprentice establish any sentient beings in the perfection of concentration?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ni ma mchis so //
translated: he did not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, although bodhisattva great beings establish all sentient beings in the perfection of concentration,

original: sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do //
analyzed: sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do //
translated: they do not establish any sentient beings in the perfection of concentration.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: rab 'byor / de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Subhūti, it is because, when you take the dharmatā of illusion as the basis, the dharmatā of all dharmas is the same as that.

original: rab 'byor / de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o //

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /

analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can @185a *//

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am /🔽sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste /🔽skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste / skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te /
translated: “Subhūti, it is just as if a magician or magician’s apprentice were to conjure up a crowd of beings at a crossroads and,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste bkod par gyur na /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste bkod par gyur na /
translated: having conjured up that crowd of beings, were to establish them in the six perfections and establish them in the four concentrations,🔽establish them in the four formless absorptions, establish them in the four immeasurables, establish them in the five clairvoyances, establish them in the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, establish them in the three gateways to liberation, establish them in the eight deliverances, establish them in the nine serial absorptions, establish them in the ten tathāgata powers, establish them in the four fearlessnesses, establish them in the four detailed and thorough knowledges, establish them in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, establish them in the perfection of giving, establish them in the perfection of morality, establish them in the perfection of patience, establish them in the perfection of perseverance, establish them in the perfection of concentration, establish them in the perfection of wisdom, and establish them in the six perfections.

original: rab 'byor / de la ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la ji snyam du sems /
translated: What do you think, Subhūti?

original: sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am /
translated: or a magician,🔽or the apprentice of a magician, who has established any sentient beings at all in the six perfections,🔽or in the emptiness of internal phenomena,🔽or in the emptiness of external phenomena,🔽or in the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena,

original: sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste /
translated: or in the emptiness of emptiness,🔽or in the emptiness of great extent,🔽or in the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽or in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽or in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽or in the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽or in the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,🔽or in the emptiness of non-dispersal,🔽or in the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽or in the emptiness of all things,

original: bkod pa yod dam /
analyzed: bkod pa yod dam /
translated: or in the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,

original: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: or in the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽or in the emptiness of non-discernible phenomena,🔽or in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities,🔽or in the emptiness of the essential nature of entities,

original: de ni ma mchis so //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: de ni ma mchis so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: or in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities,🔽or in the emptiness of the essential nature of compounded things,🔽or in the emptiness of the essential nature of uncompounded things,🔽or in the emptiness of the essential nature of the unlimited,🔽or in the emptiness of the essential nature of that which has neither beginning nor end,🔽or in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-dispersal,🔽or in the emptiness of the essential nature of the emptiness of internal phenomena,🔽or in the emptiness of the essential nature of the emptiness of external phenomena,🔽or in the emptiness of the essential nature of the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena,🔽or in the emptiness of the essential nature of the emptiness of emptiness,

analyzed: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed pa'i go mi 'byed kyi /

analyzed: bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o //

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o // nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in the perfection of wisdom.🔽I should establish them in inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o / phyi nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in outer emptiness.🔽I should establish them in inner and outer emptiness.

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o // chen po stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in ultimate emptiness.🔽I should establish them in conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la dgod @196b par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la dgod @196b par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in unconditioned emptiness.🔽I should establish them in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in the emptiness of no beginning and no end.🔽I should establish them in the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽I will establish them in the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //🔽dbang po lnga la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o // dbang po lnga la dgod par bya'o //

original: stobs lnga la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs lnga la dgod par bya'o //

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the seven factors of awakening.

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //

original: bsam gtan bzhi la dgod par bya'o //🔽tshad med pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la dgod par bya'o // tshad med pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the four meditative concentrations.🔽I will establish them in the four immeasurable aspirations.

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: so so yang dag pa rig pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: snying rje chen po la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o // dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do //

translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:🔽for example, an expert magician or magician’s apprentice might sit in the middle of a crossroads in a town and, in the presence of a crowd of many people, conjure up a crowd of many people

analyzed: skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te /

analyzed: 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: stong pa nyid bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o // dbang po lnga la dgod par bya'o //

original: stobs lnga la dgod par @197b bya'o //
analyzed: stobs lnga la dgod par @197b bya'o //
