original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the seven limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par bya'o //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par bya'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the noble eightfold path.🔽I will establish them in the four noble truths.

original: bsam gtan bzhi la dgod par bya'o //🔽tshad med pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la dgod par bya'o // tshad med pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the four concentrations.🔽I will establish them in the four immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signlessness meditative stabilization, and the wishlessness meditative stabilization.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in the five clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in all meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in all dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in the ten tathāgata powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: snying rje chen po la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o //🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽I should establish them in the result of stream enterer.🔽I should establish them in the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I should establish them in the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the fruit of being a once-returner.🔽I will establish them in the fruit of being a non-returner.🔽I will establish them in arhatship.

original: rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in individual enlightenment.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the knowledge with aspects of the path.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na /🔽rab @198a *// 'byor /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na / rab @198a *// 'byor /
translated: I will establish them in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de la ji snyam du sems /🔽sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am /
analyzed: de la ji snyam du sems / sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think of this?

original: sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: Have those magicians or magician’s apprentices established any beings in the six perfections?

original: stong pa nyid bco brgyad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid bco brgyad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: Have they established any beings in the eighteen kinds of emptiness?

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la bkod par gyur ba yod dam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la bkod par gyur ba yod dam /
translated: Have they established any beings in the four applications of mindfulness?

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: Have they established any beings in the four right efforts?

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /🔽dbang po lnga la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam / dbang po lnga la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: Have they established any beings in the four legs of miraculous power?🔽Have they established any beings in the five faculties?

original: stobs lnga la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: stobs lnga la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: Have they established any beings in the five powers?

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or the seven branches of enlightenment,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or the four concentrations,

original: tshad med pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or the four immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or the four formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or the eight aspects of liberation,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or the five kinds of supernormal knowledge,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or all the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo @198b thams cad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo @198b thams cad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or to the dhāraṇī gateways?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or to the ten powers of the tathāgatas?

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or to the four fearlessnesses?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bkod pa gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bkod pa gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or to the four detailed and thorough knowledges?

original: snying rje chen po la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or to great compassion?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?🔽or to the result of stream enterer?

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or to the result of once-returner?

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or to the result of non-returner?🔽or to the state of a worthy one?

original: rang byang chub la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: rang byang chub la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or to a pratyekabuddha’s awakening?

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or to the knowledge of path aspects?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam /🔽gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam / gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Subhūti, do you think that the bodhisattva great beings who have set out in the Great Vehicle have established any sentient beings in the knowledge of all aspects?🔽”

original: de ni ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ni ma mchis so //
translated: He replied, “No, Blessed One.🔽”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, bodhisattva great beings generate the thought to establish countless, innumerable sentient beings in the six perfections,

original: stong pa nyid bco brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid bco brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: to establish them in the eighteen emptinesses,🔽to establish them in the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: to establish them in the four right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /🔽dbang po lnga la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed / dbang po lnga la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: to establish them in the four legs of miraculous power,🔽to establish them in the five faculties,

original: @199a *// stobs lnga la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: @199a *// stobs lnga la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: to establish them in the five powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: to establish them in the seven limbs of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: and to establish them in the eightfold noble path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in the four noble truths.

original: bsam gtan bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /🔽tshad med pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed / tshad med pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in the four concentrations.🔽I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in the four immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are the gateways to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in the five kinds of superknowledge.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in all the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in all the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: I will arouse the mind intent on establishing them in the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: to establish them in the four detailed and thorough knowledges;

original: snying rje chen po la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: to establish them in great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: to establish them in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;🔽to establish them in the result of stream enterer;

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems @199b bskyed /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems @199b bskyed /
translated: to establish them in the result of once-returner;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems bskyed /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems bskyed / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: to establish them in the result of non-returner;🔽to establish them in the state of a worthy one;

original: rang byang chub la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: rang byang chub la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: to establish them in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed /
translated: to establish them in the knowledge of path aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed kyang sems can gang gi don du'ang sems bskyed pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed kyang sems can gang gi don du'ang sems bskyed pa med do //
translated: and to establish them in the knowledge of all aspects, but they do not arouse the thought of awakening for the sake of any sentient being at all.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na /
translated: Subhūti, when you take the real nature of an illusory person as the example,

original: chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te /
translated: because of the thusness of the dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, thus is a bodhisattva mahāsattva said to be wearing the great armor.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te /
analyzed: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te /
translated: I understand the meaning of what the Blessed One has said.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
translated: A bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: should be known as wearing the armor of non-armor because of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //🔽tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo //
translated: it is because form is empty of form.🔽Feeling is empty of feeling.

original: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ngo //
translated: Perception is empty of perception.

original: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo //
translated: Formations are empty of formations.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo //🔽mig mig gis stong ngo //🔽rna ba rna bas stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo // mig mig gis stong ngo // rna ba rna bas stong ngo //
translated: Consciousness is empty of consciousness.🔽The eyes are empty of the eyes.

original: sna snas stong ngo //
analyzed: sna snas stong ngo //
translated: The ears are empty of the ears.🔽The nose is empty of the nose.

original: lce lces stong ngo //
analyzed: lce lces stong ngo //
translated: the tongue is empty of the tongue,

original: lus lus kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lus lus kyis stong ngo //
translated: the body is empty of the body,

original: yid yid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: yid yid kyis stong ngo //
translated: and the mind is empty of the mind.

original: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: “Form is empty of form,

original: sgra sgras stong ngo //🔽dri dris stong ngo //
analyzed: sgra sgras stong ngo // dri dris stong ngo //
translated: sound is empty of sound,🔽smell is empty of smell,

original: ro ros stong ngo //🔽reg reg gis stong @200a *//
analyzed: ro ros stong ngo // reg reg gis stong @200a *//
translated: taste is empty of taste,🔽and touch is empty of touch.

original: ngo // chos chos kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ngo // chos chos kyis stong ngo //
translated: Phenomena are empty of phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas /
translated: “Eye consciousness is empty of eye consciousness,

original: stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: ear consciousness is empty of ear consciousness,🔽nose consciousness is empty of nose consciousness,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: tongue consciousness is empty of tongue consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: body consciousness is empty of body consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: and mind consciousness is empty of mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
translated: “Eye contact is empty of eye contact,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
translated: Ear contact is empty of ear contact.🔽Nose contact is empty of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
translated: Tongue contact is empty of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
translated: Body contact is empty of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
translated: Mind contact is empty of mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @200b bas stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @200b bas stong ngo //
translated: Contact at the sense of touch as a condition for feeling is empty of contact at the sense of touch as a condition for feeling.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo //
translated: Contact at the mind sense-sphere as a condition for feeling is empty of contact at the mind sense-sphere as a condition for feeling.

original: sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The earth element is empty of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The water element is empty of the water element.

original: me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong ngo //🔽rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong ngo // rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The fire element is empty of the fire element.🔽The wind element is empty of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The space element is empty of the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The consciousness element is empty of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ngo //
analyzed: ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ngo //
translated: Ignorance is empty of ignorance.

original: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo //
translated: Conditioned by formations is empty of conditioned by formations.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Consciousness is empty of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Name and form is empty of name and form.

original: skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong ngo //
analyzed: skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong ngo //
translated: The six sense fields are empty of the six sense fields.

original: reg pa reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: reg pa reg pas stong ngo //
translated: Contact is empty of contact.

original: tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo //🔽sred pa sred pas stong ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo // sred pa sred pas stong ngo //
translated: Sensation is empty of sensation.🔽Craving is empty of craving.

original: len pa len pas stong ngo //🔽srid pa srid pas stong ngo //
analyzed: len pa len pas stong ngo // srid pa srid pas stong ngo //
translated: Clinging is empty of clinging.🔽Becoming is empty of becoming.

original: skye ba skye bas stong ngo //
analyzed: skye ba skye bas stong ngo //
translated: Birth is empty of birth.

original: rga shi rga shis stong ngo //
analyzed: rga shi rga shis stong ngo //
translated: Aging and death are empty of aging and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of generosity is empty of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of moral discipline is empty of the perfection of moral discipline.🔽The perfection of patience is empty of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of perseverance is empty of the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of concentration is empty of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid nang stong @201a *//🔽pa nyid kyis stong ngo //🔽phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid nang stong @201a *// pa nyid kyis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Inner emptiness is empty of inner emptiness.🔽Outer emptiness is empty of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is empty of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is empty of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Great emptiness is empty of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is empty of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is empty of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is empty of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is empty of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is empty of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽The emptiness of the unlimited is empty of the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is empty of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.🔽The emptiness of non-dispersal is empty of the emptiness of non-dispersal.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is empty of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of all things is empty of the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of its own specific characteristics is empty of the emptiness of its own specific characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is empty of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngo sa po med pa stong ba nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngo sa po med pa stong ba nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of non-things is empty of the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is empty of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngo sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngo sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is empty of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are empty of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yang @201b dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yang @201b dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The right efforts are empty of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo //🔽dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo // dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The legs of miraculous power are empty of the legs of miraculous power.🔽The faculties are empty of the faculties.

original: stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The powers are empty of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The limbs of awakening are empty of the limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo //
translated: The noble eightfold path is empty of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The noble truths are empty of the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo //🔽tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo // tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the meditative stabilities are empty of the meditative stabilities,🔽the immeasurable aspirations are empty of the immeasurable aspirations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the formless absorptions are empty of the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the aspects of liberation are empty of the aspects of liberation,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the serial absorptions are empty of the serial absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa /
translated: and the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ngo //
translated: are empty of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The superknowledges are empty of the superknowledges,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis stong ngo //
translated: and all the meditative stabilities are empty of all the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyis stong ngo //
translated: all dhāraṇī gateways are empty of all dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus @202a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus @202a *//
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas are empty of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The fearlessnesses are empty of the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ngo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ngo //
translated: Great compassion is empty of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ngo //
translated: bodhisattvas are empty of bodhisattvas.

original: go cha chen po'ang go cha chen pos stong ste /
analyzed: go cha chen po'ang go cha chen pos stong ste /
translated: The great armor is empty of the great armor.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for that reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: bodhisattva great beings should be known to be wearing the armor of non-armor.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / ji skad du smas pa bzhin te /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji skad du smas pa bzhin te / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is just as you have said.🔽It is so,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just so.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas /🔽rnam par ma byas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas / rnam par ma byas /
translated: Subhūti, the knowledge of all aspects is not made,🔽not unmade,

original: mngon par ma byas /
analyzed: mngon par ma byas /
translated: not manifested.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas /
translated: Those beings for whose sake the bodhisattva great beings don out the great armor are also not made,

original: rnam par ma byas mngon par ma byas so //
analyzed: rnam par ma byas mngon par ma byas so //
translated: not unmade, not manifested.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ci'i slad du /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ci'i slad du /
translated: ” Subhūti said,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis /
translated: “Lord, why is the knowledge of all aspects not made,

original: rnam par ma bgyis /
analyzed: rnam par ma bgyis /
translated: not unmade,

original: mngon par ma bgyis pa lags /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang /
analyzed: mngon par ma bgyis pa lags / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang /
translated: not manifested?

original: ci'i slad du ma bgyis /🔽rnam @202b par ma bgyis /
analyzed: ci'i slad du ma bgyis / rnam @202b par ma bgyis /
translated: Why are those beings for whose sake the bodhisattva great beings don out the great armor also not made,🔽not unmade,

original: mngon par ma bgyis pa lags /
analyzed: mngon par ma bgyis pa lags /
translated: not manifested?🔽”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / byed pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byed pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas /🔽rnam par ma byas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas / rnam par ma byas /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is not made,🔽not made to be made,

original: mngon par ma byas so //
analyzed: mngon par ma byas so //
translated: not made manifest,🔽because the maker is not apprehended.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas /🔽rnam par ma byas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas / rnam par ma byas /
translated: Those sentient beings for whose sake the bodhisattva great beings don the great armor are also not made,🔽not made to be made,

original: mngon par ma byas so //
analyzed: mngon par ma byas so //
translated: not made manifest.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar gzugs mi byed /🔽rnam par mi byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar gzugs mi byed / rnam par mi byed /
translated: Subhūti, it is because form is not made,🔽not made to be made,

original: mngon par mi byed do //
analyzed: mngon par mi byed do //
translated: not made manifest.

original: tshor ba mi byed /🔽rnam par mi byed /
analyzed: tshor ba mi byed / rnam par mi byed /
translated: Feeling is not made,🔽not made to be made,

original: mngon par mi byed do //
analyzed: mngon par mi byed do //
translated: not made manifest.

original: 'du shes mi byed /🔽rnam par mi byed /
analyzed: 'du shes mi byed / rnam par mi byed /
translated: Perception is not made,🔽not made to be made,

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi byed / rnam par mi byed /

analyzed: mngon par mi byed do // rab 'byor / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed /
translated: They do not make contact with the form constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the eye consciousness constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the ear constituent.

analyzed: rnam par mi byed / mngon par mi byed @203b do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed /
translated: They do not make contact with the sound constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the ear consciousness constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the nose constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the smell constituent.

original: rnam par mi byed /🔽mngon par mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam par mi byed / mngon par mi byed do //
translated: They do not make contact with the nose consciousness constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the tongue constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the taste constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the tongue consciousness constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the body constituent.

translated: They do not make contact with the tangible object constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the body consciousness constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the mental constituent.

original: mngon par mi byed do //
analyzed: mngon par mi byed do //
translated: They do not make contact with the phenomenon constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the mental consciousness constituent.🔽They do not make contact with the earth element.🔽They do not make contact with the water element.🔽They do not make contact with the fire element.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed /🔽rnam par mi byed /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed / rnam par mi byed /
translated: They do not make contact with the wind element.🔽They do not make contact with the space element.🔽They do not make contact with the consciousness element.🔽They do not make contact with the perfection of generosity.

original: mngon par mi byed do //
analyzed: mngon par mi byed do //
translated: They do not make contact with the perfection of ethical discipline.🔽They do not make contact with the perfection of patience.🔽They do not make contact with the perfection of perseverance.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed /🔽rnam par mi byed /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed / rnam par mi byed /
translated: They do not make contact with the perfection of concentration.🔽They do not make contact with the perfection of wisdom.🔽They do not make contact with the applications of mindfulness.

original: mngon par mi byed do //
analyzed: mngon par mi byed do //
translated: They do not make contact with the right efforts.🔽They do not make contact with the legs of miraculous power.🔽They do not make contact with the faculties.🔽They do not make contact with the powers.🔽They do not make contact with the branches of enlightenment.🔽They do not make contact with the path.🔽They do not make contact with the ten powers.🔽They do not make contact with the four fearlessnesses.🔽They do not make contact with the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽They do not make contact with the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed /🔽rnam par mi byed /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed / rnam par mi byed /
translated: They do not experience or create feelings conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded.🔽

original: mngon par mi byed do //🔽rab 'byor / bdag ni mi byed /🔽rnam par mi byed /🔽mngon par mi byed do /
analyzed: mngon par mi byed do // rab 'byor / bdag ni mi byed / rnam par mi byed / mngon par mi byed do /
translated: He does not make, does not produce, and does not set in motion the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: He does not make, does not produce, and does not set in motion the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact,

original: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //🔽rab 'byor / sems can ni mi byed /🔽rnam par mi byed /
analyzed: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // rab 'byor / sems can ni mi byed / rnam par mi byed /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact,🔽the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact,🔽the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact,🔽or the feeling that arises from the condition of thinking-mind contact.🔽Subhūti, he does not make, does not produce, and does not set in motion a self.

original: mngon par mi byed de /🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon par mi byed de / de ci'i phyir zhe na / de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He does not make, does not produce, and does not set in motion a being,

original: rab 'byor / srog ni mi byed /🔽rnam par mi byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / srog ni mi byed / rnam par mi byed /
translated: a soul, a person,🔽a human being,🔽a human,🔽a man,🔽a human body,🔽a human agent,🔽a human experiencer,

original: mngon par mi byed de /🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: mngon par mi byed de / de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //

original: rab 'byor / 'gro ba ni mi byed /🔽rnam par mi byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'gro ba ni mi byed / rnam par mi byed /
translated: Subhūti, he does not make, does not produce, and does not set in motion a sentient being.
